trees.tree: Acer monspessulanum Montpellier Maple, Lesser Maple. Deciduous. 6 to 10 meters. Spherical crown. Straight main trunk with branches. Drooping foliage. Bright green upper side, whitish green underside. Strong frost resistance (up to -15째C)
Olea europea Olive Tree Evergreen 8 to 15 meters Irregular crown. Irregular main trunk with bifurcations..
Ramaje tortuoso Dark green upper side, silvery green underside Moderate frost resistance (up to -10째C)

Platanus orientalis Plane Tree Deciduous 20 to 25 meters Ovoid crown. Straight main trunk. Expansive branching. Medium green upper side, light green underside Ochre Strong frost resistance (up to -20째C)

Quercus ilex Holm Oak Evergreen Around 25 meters Spherical or irregularly elliptical crown. Straight main trunk. Twisted branches. Silvery in young leaves. In mature leaves, dark green upper side, silvery underside. Strong frost resistance (down to -15째C)
